'''Star of Another World''' is [[Aloy]]'s Level 1 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
*During the [[Labyrinth Warriors]] event in [[Version 2.2]], it was possible to temporarily activate this constellation through the "Exposure: Bastion of Order" Charm.
